item.title: Course Topics
item.description: This page contains an outline of topics we will cover in this course and will updated often. As always, suggestions are welcome. Please continue to work on your skills in CSS, HTML, and CLI. See the Self-Paced Tutorials for more information. Lesson Topic Skills L0 R Markdown example L1 Setup IDE, Dev Tools, GitHub, RStudio L1 Problem Solving Web search, GitHub, StackOverflow L2 R Markdown Page YAML, Markdown, R Code chunks, inline R Code L2 R Markdown Page Tables, Figures L3 GitHub Submitting Issues & Requests, Pull Requests L3 Git & GitHub Git from the CLI, Creating & cloning a Repo, Push changes L4 Customization CSS style sheets, inline HTML code L4 R Markdown Site Take what you’ve learned and make a site Archiving Data Figshare Edit this page
